pages.text: FTBIC's $(item)Nuclear Reactor$() works almost identically to $(major)Industrial Craft$()'s, with a handful of quality-of-life changes.$(br2)The Nuclear Reactor's GUI has 9x6 inventory slots, 2 gauges, and 2 buttons.$(br2)The top gauge shows the ⚡/t being generated, and the bottom shows the Reactor's current $(l:ftbic:generators/nuclear/heat)heat$().

The first button allows you to $(major)simulate$() the Reactor, using the Reactor's contents. This tells you:$(li)How long the Reactor will run$(li)If the Reactor will explode, and the explosion radius$(li)The ⚡/t generated$(li)The total ⚡ generated$(br)The second button pauses/unpauses the Reactor.
